subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.
author: juli velazquez
full_text:
--0-1174887869-1202014335=:64247
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=iso-8859-1
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 8bit

Your very welcome Laura, and just an FYI, I don't have a Frank's Box.  I would never ask for one.  I appreciate your dedication to this field, and I am sure once you get one your box, you will be an asset to the group!
   
  Looking forward to hearing your files!  
   
  Juli
   
  Laura Kimberley <gjk1rrfan@...> wrote:
              Thank you Julie, for the kindness in your words to remind me that you think I am begging and should take it private email. I see you have a box so your tolerance of course is not quite like the others. I only wanted one simply to communicate with friends and family and myself spiritually and nothing else. Like taking it on the road. That I have no desire what�s so ever. I wanted one for strictly personal use. But, I am a smart lady and will build my own and share I get with Frank privately. 
  Please, be more considerate on this board. I shall not ask again. J Thanks so much again for your reply,
  Laura
  
      From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of juli velazquez
Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 10:35 PM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.


  
          With all due respect, the man just got back on the board.  I don't think that the very first thing he would like to get thrown at him is OH PLEASE BUILD ME A BOX.  For if I had a pennie for every person in the last 2 years I seen big to boxes and hit and run not sharing any of their data, I will be a millionaire!!!

    

    At least do it in private email.

    

    Juli

Robin Searcy Henson <MudPuddleFarm@...> wrote:

            Laura deserves a box Frank!!

    

    Robin

    

    

      ----- Original Message ----- 

    From: Laura Kimberley 

    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 

    Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 7:55 PM

    Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.

    

          Welcome back Frank,

    I have a que stion for you. You have given boxes all men here in the group except one man has any woman been given the opportunity to have a box? I have requested one for a  long time now and even offered to pay you.

    But if you just send me the schematics I will build it, I am studying electronics now and here in Mexico the random would be a good thing I believe. Because even though  there's no English speaking stations near me all I get is English J

    Laura

        From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Frank Sumption
Sent: Saturday, February 02, 2008 9:17 PM
To: evp-itc@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Yeah--it works.



          
 There is a lack of the background hiss, and white noise of the random tuned systems.
 
 The sweep circuit is simple, and using pre-made tuners a real time saver, provided a source for the older tuners can be found. I used to get them from junk yards, but the old radios are getting harder to find. They have the advantage of all the RF components matching the chip.
 
 Frank-S




    
---------------------------------
  
    Shed those extra pounds with MSN and The Biggest Loser! Learn more.
